text: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Health is not just about what you’re eating. It’s about what you’re thinking and saying too.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

text: Your health is an investment, not an expense.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

text: The first wealth is health.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: You can’t enjoy wealth if you’re not in good health.
author: Unknown

text: To keep the body in good health is a duty, otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

text: Your body hears everything your mind says. Stay positive.
author: Unknown

text: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind, and spirit.
author: B.K.S. Iyengar

text: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

text: A healthy body is a guest-chamber for the soul; a sick body is a prison.
author: Francis Bacon

text: Small steps every day lead to big changes in your health.
author: Unknown

text: The food you eat can be either the safest and most powerful form of medicine or the slowest form of poison.
author: Ann Wigmore

text: Don’t wait for your body to beg for health. Start nurturing it today.
author: Unknown

text: Health is not about the weight you lose, but the life you gain.
author: Unknown

text: Your body is a reflection of your lifestyle.
author: Unknown

text: Exercise is a celebration of what your body can do, not a punishment for what you ate.
author: Unknown

text: The key to a healthy life is a healthy mind.
author: Unknown

text: Rest when you’re weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit.
author: Ralph Marston

text: Every step you take toward health is a step toward a better life.
author: Unknown

text: Health is not just the absence of disease, but the presence of vitality.
author: Unknown

text: You don’t have to be perfect to be healthy, just consistent.
author: Unknown

text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Unknown

text: Eat well, move daily, hydrate often, sleep lots, love your body.
author: Unknown

text: Your health is worth every effort you put into it.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy lifestyle is a journey, not a race.
author: Unknown

text: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it is something we can create.
author: Unknown

text: Take care of your body today so it can take care of you tomorrow.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest gift you can give yourself is a healthy you.
author: Unknown

text: Health is the crown on the well person’s head that only the ill person can see.
author: Robin Sharma

text: Your body is your most priceless possession; take care of it.
author: Jack Lalanne

text: Every healthy choice you make is a victory.
author: Unknown

text: To change your body, you must first change your mind.
author: Unknown

text: Health is not a destination; it’s a way of life.
author: Unknown

text: Your body can stand almost anything. It’s your mind you have to convince.
author: Unknown

text: Don’t let a bad day turn into a bad lifestyle.
author: Unknown

text: Health is the soul that animates all the enjoyments of life.
author: William Temple

text: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

text: You can’t pour from an empty cup. Take care of yourself first.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy mind does not speak ill of others.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest of follies is to sacrifice health for any other kind of happiness.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

text: Every day is a new chance to improve your health.
author: Unknown

text: Your health is your responsibility. Own it.
author: Unknown

text: Movement is medicine for the body and soul.
author: Unknown

text: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love—these cannot be bought.
author: Unknown

text: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
author: Franklin P. Adams

text: The power of healing lies within you; nourish it with care.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy life is a happy life.
author: Unknown

text: Your body deserves the best fuel, the best care, and the best love.
author: Unknown

text: Health is the foundation of all your dreams.
author: Unknown

text: The only bad workout is the one you didn’t do.
author: Unknown

text: Your health is a journey, not a sprint. Keep going.
author: Unknown

text: Eat to nourish your body, not to stress your mind.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy lifestyle is the best gift you can give to your future self.
author: Unknown

text: The best project you’ll ever work on is you.
author: Unknown

text: Health is not just about the body; it’s about the mind and spirit too.
author: Unknown

text: You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent.
author: Unknown

text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

text: Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.
author: Astrid Alauda

text: Healthy habits are built one choice at a time.
author: Unknown

text: The secret to health is to love yourself enough to take care of yourself.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy body is a vehicle for a healthy mind.
author: Unknown

text: Don’t sacrifice your health for temporary pleasures.
author: Unknown

text: The best time to start getting healthier was yesterday. The second best time is now.
author: Unknown

text: Your health is your greatest asset; protect it fiercely.
author: Unknown

text: Every healthy meal is a step toward a stronger you.
author: Unknown

text: The body you want starts with the choices you make today.
author: Unknown

text: Health is not a goal; it’s a lifestyle.
author: Unknown

text: You are stronger than your excuses.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy mind and body are the keys to a fulfilling life.
author: Unknown

text: Your health is a reflection of the love you show yourself.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest medicine of all is to teach people how not to need it.
author: Hippocrates

text: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
author: Thomas Fuller

text: Your body is capable of amazing things if you give it the chance.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy life is built on small, consistent choices.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing standing between you and a healthier you is action.
author: Unknown

text: Your health is your power; don’t give it away.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy lifestyle is the ultimate act of self-love.
author: Unknown

text: The best way to feel good is to do good for your body.
author: Unknown

text: Health is the bridge between your dreams and your reality.
author: Unknown

text: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Your body is your home; keep it clean and strong.
author: Unknown

text: Health is not about perfection; it’s about progress.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest act of courage is to take care of yourself.
author: Unknown

text: Your health is a gift; don’t take it for granted.
author: Unknown

text: Every workout is a step closer to the best version of you.
author: Unknown

text: Health is the harmony between body, mind, and soul.
author: Unknown

text: The best way to honor your body is to listen to it.
author: Unknown

text: You can’t control everything, but you can control how you treat your body.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy life starts with a healthy mindset.
author: Unknown

text: Your body is a work in progress; keep building it.
author: Unknown

text: Health is not a one-time achievement; it’s a daily commitment.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest health is to love what you do and do what you love.
author: Unknown

text: Your health is your future; invest in it now.
author: Unknown

text: A healthy body is the foundation for a happy life.
author: Unknown

text: The only way to achieve better health is to start where you are.
author: Unknown

text: Your body is a garden; tend to it with care.
author: Unknown

text: Health is the ultimate rebellion against a world that profits from your sickness.
author: Unknown

text: The journey to health begins with a single step.
author: Unknown
